original_text: But now this other son of yours has returned. He has wasted all the money that you gave to him. He has spent it on prostitutes. But you have even killed the fat young cow for him.”
korean_text: 아버지의 살림을 창녀들과 함께 삼켜 버린 이 아들이 돌아오매 이를 위하여 살진 송아지를 잡으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: But now this other son of yours has returned
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 이제 당신의 다른 아들이 돌아왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He has wasted all the money that you gave to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 그에게 준 모든 돈을 낭비했습니다

sentences.original_text: He has spent it on prostitutes
But you have even killed the fat young cow for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 당신은 그를 위해 심지어 살진 어린 송아지까지 잡았습니다
